p: Samples were stored at -20 Â°C at the Institute for the Conservation of Nature and Forest (ICNF) tissue depository (BTVS/ICNB) and in the Monitoring System of Dead Wolves (SMLM/ICNF). The collection site, gender, age and the preservation status was recorded for each animal (Table S1). Sampled tissues from the Iberian wolf included liver, spleen and lymph node; liver, spleen, small intestine/rectum and lungs for the red fox and for the remaining animal species small intestine/rectum and lungs.
